contentrichtext.text: In [[telecommunication]], the term '''black facsimile transmission''' has the following meanings: # In [[fax|facsimile]] systems using [[amplitude modulation]], that form of [[transmission (telecommunications)|transmission]] in which the maximum transmitted [[power (physics)|power]] corresponds to the maximum density of the subject. # In facsimile systems using [[frequency modulation]], that form of transmission in which the lowest transmitted frequency corresponds to the maximum density of the subject. ==See also== * [[White facsimile transmission]] ==References== *{{FS1037C MS188}} [[Category:Telecommunication theory]] [[Category:Fax]]
